DANIEL OLARTE

Technical Leader | Digital Innovator

About

Director de equipos de implementación técnicos para la region latinomerica, 10 años de experiencia en la puesta en producción de más de 10 proyectos de automatización multimillonarios para las corporaciones bancarias mas reconocidas de la región. He liderado el diseño, desarrollo e implementación de nuevas plataformas escalables que hoy en dia tienen un gran impacto y han facilitado la manera como las personas pueden realizar sus transacciones a través de distintos canales.

Por qué Laika?

Desde que soy pequeño he amado el emprendimiento, quisiera aprender mucho de lo que ustedes han logrado en Laika y contribuir en pro de vuestra visión.

Hace poco tiempo llegué de Holanda, en donde tuve la oportunidad de crear un nuevo producto junto con el equipo de innovación digital. Esta experiencia es reveladora en tanto logro dilucidar las tecnologías que van a impactar fuertemente la industria los siguientes 5 años. Pienso que podría liderar un proyecto de innovación tecnológica para Laika, en donde se automaticen los procesos que impactan al cliente.

Experience

Senior Software Engineer Technical Lead

AVAL Group , Transfiya

Architectural Designer and leader of implementation for a new highly scalable Financial Core system. This implementation will integrate the whole Aval group. (Bogota Bank, AVVILLAS Bank, Occidente Bank and Popular Bank). As a result of this, thousands of people in Colombia will be able to send and receive money by typing the destiny cellphone number.

Check this out!
March 2020 - Present

Senior Software Engineer - Innovation Team (Netherlands -Holanda)

Banktrade Systems LLC

As an expert on the the trade finance automation, I'm called by the European headquarters of Banktrade Systems to join the innovation Dutch team. This is a nurtured environment where I re engineered the main software product of the company. As a result of this, new customers in the Australian region are engaged.

Being closed to the officers of the company enhanced my vision of how the technological business works.

March 2019 - August 2019

Team Leader Latam Region

Banktrade Systems LLC

Manager of the the customer support team for Latam region. Created a new strategy. As a result of this, my team became the most successful in providing satisfaction to highly important banking customer in the region in a short period of time. Corporations where my team and I performed where:

  • Colombia: BBVA, Occidente Bank, AV-VILLAS, Banco Popular, Davivienda, ITAU.
  • Argentina: Galicia Bank, Santander Bank.
  • Chile: BICE Bank.
  • Mexico: BBVA Bancomer, Santander Bank, Bannorte, Banco Nacional del Comercio Exterior.
  • Perú: Banco de la Nación

Action!, the main goal was moving from focusing on delivering just fast to delivering high-quality products in a shorter time. Made this possible by implementing new technologies, modifying bad procedures and mentoring. I encouraged people to embrace the corporate culture and to take care of the customer in the best possible way. As a result of this, we were able to reengage with old customers and to provide implementations faster than other groups.

January 2018 - December 2018

International Customer Support Engineer

Banktrade Systems LLC

All this time I was mentored by remarkable region managers, international project managers and technical partners in a variety of countries. Acquired the ability to understand the intrinsic aspects of the business and to drive highly important banking customers in several countries from manual operations to automatized solutions in the trade finance field. Coding great products and establishing meaningful relations with the clients were my daily commitments.

  • Colombia: BBVA, Occidente Bank, AV-VILLAS, Banco Popular, Davivienda, ITAU.
  • Argentina: Galicia Bank, Santander Bank.
  • Chile: BICE Bank.
  • Mexico: BBVA Bancomer, Santander Bank, Bannorte, Banco Nacional del Comercio Exterior.
  • Perú: Banco de la Nación
March 2013 - January 2018

Customer Support Engineer

Colsoft S.A

Customer support of technological platforms. Monitoring, technical troubleshooting, data analysis, and communications for the following Colombian state entities:

  • ColombiaN Ministry of Culture.
  • Agricultural Bank.
  • DANE (National Department of Statistics).
July 2012 - February 2013

Change Control Board Sub-Coordinator

Telefonica Movistar

Sub-coordinator of integrated change control. Monitoring and Controlling requests and change requests for mobile marketing campaigns at Movistar Colombia. Assistance in the change control board, procurement of high-level requirements for marketing campaigns, risk analysis through data and communication to the business team.

February 2012 - July 2012

Junior Software Engineer

BBVA Colombia

Software developer of enterprise software solutions for the BBVA Colombia banking customers. Analysis, coding, testing, installation, and support. Frameworks & Platforms: Altamira, Cobol, Java EE, DB2, SQL Servers.

July 2010 - December 2010
